take_Average module¶

take_Average.average(mat, mins)[source]¶

gets the length in items in an array of each interval of the time that is inputed in minutes

Parameters:
  • mat – (ndarray)
  • mins – (int)
Returns:

list of same length as instantaneous hr that gives average HR at each time point
take_Average.get_interval(mat, mins)[source]¶

gets the length in items in an array of each interval of the time that is inputed in minutes

Parameters:
  • mat – (ndarray)
  • mins – (int)
Returns:

length of the interval in float
